seo.title: LocalSend: Share files to nearby devices
seo.description: LocalSend is a free, open-source, cross-platform file sharing tool that allows you to share files to nearby devices.

features.title: Features
features.decentralizedDescription: Share files without a central server. The file transfer is completely peer-to-peer.
features.crossPlatformDescription: LocalSend is available for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS.
features.freeDescription: LocalSend is free to use. No ads, no tracking, no hidden costs.
features.openSourceDescription: The source code is publicly available. Everyone can contribute to the project.
features.secureDescription: End-to-end encryption ensures that only you and the recipient can access your files.
features.easyDescription: A simple user interface without registration. Other devices are discovered automatically.

seo.title: LocalSend - Downloads
seo.description: Download LocalSend for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS.

seo.title: LocalSend - Community
seo.description: Get help, get involved, and contribute to LocalSend.

community.title: Community
community.getHelpDescription: Ask or look for answers on GitHub Discussions.
community.getInvolvedDescription: Get in contact with the developers and contribute directly to the project.
